short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stylezer for the web site English My Way (https://englishmyway.online)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a tool to change the way the website is displayed, got a new look for activities and vocabulary and fixed some bugs on the page.

It allows to visualize the images of the vocabulary
Added an audio tool that allows you to listen to the pronunciation of the vocabulary in 3 different voices
